sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Boxwood (Buxus sempervirens 'Chloe') is a remarkable evergreen shrub with amazing features. It has glossy, apple-green foliage, and grows in an attractive, neat round shape. It is a slow to moderate grower that is perfect for creating gardens and landscapes. The foliage holds up even in cold climates, making it an ideal choice for adding year-round color and texture. Boxwood 'Chloe' is also easy to maintain as it requires little pruning. It's versatile too, as it can be used both indoors and outdoors to add interest. Boxwood 'Chloe' is a great plant species that can be enjoyed for years to come.
